meanings: if you do not have anything particular to do
if it is convenient to you

phrases.phrase: 돈이 없으면 적막강산이요, 돈이 있으면 금수강산이라
meanings: (속담) A full purse makes the heart light.
건강과 음주 I can't live without alcohol.

meanings.meaning: when the cat's away the mice will play
if you can't beat them, join them
absence makes the heart grow fonder

vlive.korean: 넌 진짜 좋아 죽잖아 - 나 진짜 하루도 없으면... You love chocolate. - I can't go one day without it. 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: You love chocolate. - I can't go one day without it.

vlive.english: Honestly, if he wears shoes and this wasn't here.. - Wear shoes! You'll catch a cold!
